unnormalised: Arre baba, Dilli re nowa rog bela gutu akaana ona serenj tahen kana? Onko do "Dilli Belly 2.0" mente ko metakeda - original, ingijń janam akaana! AIIMS re Dr. Sharma menakeda street food jatijń bam joma, ohonj roga, enan jatijń bam emoka! Anyways, dahu do 100°F leka uper, abare do joma, apunarji kana, Bollywood music rejama batijń daren kana (okay, ingijń uljhao akata). Seriously menkhan, mask lagaoh, aapin tahelen se Dettol se sudujń (Rs. 45 sanaj botol kate), golgappa baki kajijń alope emoka, okay? Alonj roga, doctor bill Rs. 500 emog menkhan bang?
normalised: Arre baba, Dilli re nutun flu serma menah akan taheń, ona geń am ńutum ket́ daŕeakana? Unun "Dilli Belly two point zero" menket́ko tay kana - oroginal, ańńom menket́ko tay kana! A-I-I-M-S re Doctor Sharma meneda, jorow reaḱ jom ho bań jomkateń onań reaḱ bacaw talaŕkae, ammen kanj kan kan! Enteń, simpton gidre menahakan taheń one hundred degree fahrenheit khon dońgeń tapal, mit́teń bohut asahay reaḱ dhao, ar mit́teń Bollywood music tańgeń lekan reaḱ dhao (okay, ammen onań peŕeń taykana). serius daŕeń taheń, mask menahakan taheń, Dettol reaḱ ateń re taheń (rupees forty five at́oń reaḱ mocań), ar golgappas bań ńuń menahakan taheń, okay? Bacaw do bań daŕeń rupeań reaḱ bill five hundred, ya?
